Welcome to the State of Midway documentation site. Here you will find all documentation related to the State of Midway [TOC]

docs.title: 1.1 Fail Role-Play (FRP)
docs.text: Engage in realistic and character-driven role-playing at all times. Maintain character integrity and believability in scenarios.

docs.title: 1.2 Random Death Match (RDM)
docs.text: Unjustified killing or harm to another player is forbidden. Actions must have a role-play basis.

docs.title: 1.3 Vehicle Death Match (VDM)
docs.text: Damaging or destroying vehicles without a role-play reason is not allowed.

docs.title: 1.4 Trolling
docs.text: Disruptive behavior meant to degrade others' role-play experience, including griefing and harassment, is banned.

docs.title: 1.5 Dress Code
docs.text: Wear realistic attire fitting your character and scenario.

docs.title: 1.6 Whitelisted Teams
docs.text: You may only join teams you are whitelisted on.

docs.title: 1.7 Realism
docs.text: Maintain scenario authenticity, avoiding unrealistic weapons, vehicles, and actions.

docs.title: 1.8 Voice Chat Requirement
docs.text: You are required to participate in Roblox voice chat.

docs.title: 1.9 Banned/Restricted Roleplays
docs.text: Follow the below guide on restricted roleplays to prevent chaos.

docs.title: 1.10 Glitching/Exploiting
docs.text: Exploiting game bugs is prohibited and subject to immediate ban.

docs.title: 1.11 Roblox TOS Adherence
docs.text: All players must comply with Roblox's terms of service.

docs.title: 1.12 Staff Impersonation & Mini-Mods
docs.text: Seek staff assistance for rule enforcement. Unauthorized rule enforcement may lead to moderation.

docs.title: 1.13 New Life Rule (NLR)
docs.text: Upon character death, adopt a new persona with no previous memories.

docs.title: 1.14 Engagement Restrictions
docs.text: Follow guidelines on bank robberies, equipment misuse, and safe zones to ensure a respectful role-play environment.

docs.title: 1.15 Non-Interference
docs.text: Do not disrupt ongoing scenes you are not a part of, including mod scenes.

docs.title: 1.16 Behavioral Expectations
docs.text: Avoid actions like stream sniping, abuse of emergency services, and unrealistic role-play scenarios.

docs.title: 2.1 No packages
docs.text: Use the regular blocky body package and face package.

docs.title: 2.3 No over the top hats
docs.text: If you can not wear it in real life, you can’t wear it here.

docs.title: 2.5 Dress for the occasion
docs.text: If you are going to rob a store, dress like a robber.
